mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.no AS "no", a.chinese_name AS "chineseName", a.name AS "name", a.english_name AS "englishName", a.english_short AS "englishShort", a.alias AS "alias", a.eam_bank AS "eamBank", a.eam_sysgroup_id AS "eamSysgroupId", a.eam_aa_layer_id AS "eamAaLayerId", a.eam_org_layer AS "eamOrgLayer", a.eam_build_type AS "eamBuildType", a.eam_build_state AS "eamBuildState", a.online_date AS "onlineDate", a.eam_trend AS "eamTrend", a.target_system AS "targetSystem", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO eam_system( id, no, chinese_name, name, english_name, english_short, alias, eam_bank, eam_sysgroup_id, eam_aa_layer_id, eam_org_layer, eam_build_type, eam_build_state, online_date, eam_trend, target_system, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{no}, #{chineseName}, #{name}, #{englishName}, #{englishShort}, #{alias}, #{eamBank}, #{eamSysgroupId}, #{eamAaLayerId}, #{eamOrgLayer}, #{eamBuildType}, #{eamBuildState}, #{onlineDate}, #{eamTrend}, #{targetSystem}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
